imdb.plot outline: As a Kabbalist parapsychologist, An atheist psychologist, and a Zoroaster demonologist team up with different people with different beliefs in search of the spirits of once criminals, serial killers & linked to the occult. We will all see if the paranormal is real or not. The spirits will be judged after death & analyzed from our psychologist, our parapsychologist will try to contact the dead & our demonologist will contact any evil spirits or demons.
imdb.title: Paranormalogy Iran
